name: GoodPix Content Share
author: GoodPix

sections.description: Create shoppable content in GoodPix and share it easily in your WordPress site. You can create style or design boards on a blank screen and earn commissions when your content is shopped. You can upload images or videos and tag them with shoppable product. Create product recommendations and organize them into collections.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the goodpix folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘GoodPix Content Share’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
> How to share embed Board?

  1. Goto your goodpix app and open content library, click on 3 dots and open popover menu and find “Get Embed Code”.
  2. Copy short code for board and paste into your page or post

> How to share embed Image?

  1. Goto your goodpix app and open content library, click on 3 dots and open popover menu and find “Get Embed Code”.
  2. Copy short code for image and paste into your page or post

> How to share embed Video?

  1. Goto your goodpix app and open content library, click on 3 dots and open popover menu and find “Get Embed Code”.
  2. Copy short code for video and paste into your page or post

> How to share embed Collection?

  1. Goto your goodpix app and open collections, click on 3 dots and open popover menu and find “Get Embed Code”.
  2. Copy short code for collection and paste into your page or post

> How to share embed Group?

  1. Goto your goodpix app and open products section then goto the “Product Groups”, click on 3 dots and open popover menu and find “Get Embed Code”.
  2. Copy short code for group and paste into your page or post
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

Patch that resolves Embed Items since moving from www.goodpix.co to app.goodpix.co.

1.1.0

Improved responsiveness and customization over GoodPix Embedded Content.

1.0.0

This is an initial release, user can use goodpix content in his/her page or post.
